text:
Nikolay entered, looking young and slim. 

Porfiry Petrovitch frowned. 

“Go away, it’s too soon!” he snapped. 

Nikolay knelt down. 

“What’s the matter?” Porfiry asked, surprised. 

“I am guilty! Mine is the sin! I am the murderer,” Nikolay gasped. 

Silence filled the room. 

Even the warder stepped back, stunned. 

“What … whom did you kill?” Porfiry stammered. 

“Alyona Ivanovna and her sister Lizaveta Ivanovna, I…”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Nikolay confesses to Porfiry Petrovitch that he is the murderer of Alyona Ivanovna and her sister Lizaveta.
